attributes.action: Bring in a law regarding "Stolen Valour"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have recently been several cases of "Walter Mitty" types claiming military or civil awards that they have no right to, some of these characters have been walking around pretending service in the forces that they have never had.  We the undersigned request the prime minister to bring an end to these counterfeit "heroes" by making these claims illegal and punishable by law.
